message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this valuable product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this deal. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product.

I understand that you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.

I understand that you're still looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1025000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product.
